summary: A recently-deposed European monarch seeks shelter in New York City, where he becomes an accidental television celebrity and is later wrongly accused of being a Communist.
cast: Charles Chaplin|Maxine Audley|Jerry Desmonde|Oliver Johnston|Dawn Addams|Sidney James|Joan Ingram|Michael Chaplin|John McLaren|Phil Brown|Harry Green|Robert Arden|Alan Gifford|Robert Cawdron|George Woodbridge|Clifford Buckton|Vincent Lawson|Shani Wallis|Joy Nichols|Lauri Lupino Lane|George Truzzi|Yvonne Romain|Tony Crombie|Pat Gibson|Anne Gilleno|Wendy Graham|Lilian Grassom|Arthur Gross|Tubby Hayes|Frazer Hines|Roy Hines|Penelope Horner|Jemma Hyde|Jeanette Jacobs|Pauline Keen|Kevin Kelly|Hugh McDermott|Bill Nagy|MacDonald Parke|Jose Read|Michael Saunders|Antoinette Seaborn|Richard Shaw|Bernice Swanson|Gareth Tandy|Nicholas Tannar|David Tilley|Howard Vaughn|Gillian Watt|Robin Wheeler|Ross Yeo
keywords: slapstick comedy|fake movie trailer|communist|new york city|revolution
title: Un rey en Nueva York
